sentences.en: Grand Preceptor Wen: Aiya! I ? was really vertigo, I should move this step.
sentences.cn: 闻: 哎呀! 老臣真是眼花了, 应该走这一步才对.

sentences.en: He is at once the product and preceptor of his time.
sentences.cn: 他既是时代的产儿,也是时代的先锋.

sentences.en: This seal was presented by a Mongol Great Khan to the Namo Grand Preceptor.
sentences.cn: 此印是蒙哥大汗赐予那摩国师的封印.

sentences.en: Today, King Zhoufeel free and has invited General Huang, Grand Preceptor andPrinceWenfor chess game.
sentences.cn: 今天, 纣王闲来无事,就请了黄飞虎, 闻太师和周文王来下下棋.
